HomePage.title: Hello!

errors.camera_access_required: You need to grant camera access. Please enable permissions in browser settings and reload the page.

HomePage.select_layout_description: A vertical strip of photos to capture your best moments in one fun layout
HomePage.select_frame_description: Choose a stylish frame to highlight your photos and add a finishing touch
HomePage.layout_tips_content: Choose your favorite photos and customize the frame by selecting a solid color or gradient to create the perfect photo strip. Use the color picker to fine-tune. When satisfied, press the Download button below.
HomePage.sticker_tips_content: Choose from pre-designed sticker layouts or add personal stickers to customize your photo. Stickers will be included in the final download file.
HomePage.scan_content: Scan this QR code with your phone camera to instantly view and download your creation
HomePage.commitmentStatement: At Mintbooth, we are committed to protecting your privacy. We do not collect any personal information from our users.
HomePage.noDataCollectionPolicyDescription: Our photo booth service operates with a strict no-data-collection policy. This means:
HomePage.noDataCollectionPolicy1: We do not collect or store your personal information
HomePage.noDataCollectionPolicy2: We do not track your usage or behavior
HomePage.noDataCollectionPolicy3: We do not use cookies to identify you
HomePage.noDataCollectionPolicy4: We do not share any information with third parties
HomePage.noDataCollectionPolicy5: We do not retain any data after your session ends
HomePage.photoPrivacyDescription: When you use our photo booth:
HomePage.photoPrivacy1: Photos are temporarily stored only for the duration of your session
HomePage.photoPrivacy2: All photos are automatically deleted once you receive your prints or digital copies
HomePage.photoPrivacy3: We do not maintain any backup or archive of your photos
HomePage.photoPrivacy4: We do not use facial recognition or any other identification technology
HomePage.ourTechnologyDescription: Our photo booth system is designed with privacy in mind:
HomePage.ourTechnology1: All processing happens locally on the booth
HomePage.ourTechnology2: No cloud storage or processing is used
HomePage.ourTechnology3: No internet connection is required for core functionality
HomePage.contactUsDescription: If you have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us at:
HomePage.save_step_1: Press and hold on the image above
HomePage.save_step_2: Tap "Save to Photos" from the menu that appears
HomePage.save_step_3: The image will be saved to your photo library
HomePage.uploadLimitNotSet: The upload limit is not set properly.
HomePage.uploadMaxFiles: You can only upload up to {maxFiles} {fileLabel}.
